txt.en:
'Treasure-seekers, undead Oathbreakers, Easterling rats...it is all too much. We need to deal with these brigands, and soon! If you journey along the road into the Rushgore, you will find the camp of my friend, Aculf.

'Aculf will likely know from whence the treasure-hunters are raiding the Field of Celebrant. His party is small, so he will need your help ousting the wretches.

'May fortune shine upon you, [placeholder].'
'Ha! Idmar managed to find an adventurer in these accursed wilds? Well, he is right. With just the few of us here, we will indeed need your assistance.'
'Aculf will need your aid, I am sure, stuck in that accursed marsh as he is.'
After assisting the Rohirrim in Parth Celebrant, you are sent to the scout-camp in the Rushgore to deal with the treasure-hunters raiding the Field of Celebrant for ancient relics.
Talk to Aculf at his camp in the Rushgore
Aculf is at his camp in the Rushgore, along the road east from Parth Celebrant.\n\nIdmar asked you to offer your assistance to his friend Aculf.
